title: Man who trekked to honor Goodluck Jonathan escapes death in Auto Accident
content:
OladeleNihi became popular after he trekked to Bayelsa after Goodluck Jonathan lost the election. Nihi who survived a ghastly accident today shared his testimony saying
Thank You Jesus for saving my Life from this terrible accident that almost claim my life on Okene Lokoja Road.In an attempt to save the life of an Okada man who ran into me from no where on Okene road, I almost lost mine"
